title: Union of EMA - Shelf Life Type And EMA - Shelf Life Type

concept.display: Shelf life of the medicinal product as packaged for sale
Shelf life after first opening the immediate packaging
Shelf life after dilution or reconstitution according to directions
Shelf life from the activity reference time stated on the label
Shelf life after incorporation into meal or pelleted feed
